name: Robeo & Juliet
description:
Control the star-crossed lovers, Robeo and Juliet as they fight for their love against the evil Mecha-Capulet. The controller controls are visible in-game, keyboard controls will be listed here until a proper help screen for them has been implemented.

Use WASD to control Robeo, move Juliet with the arrow keys. Q and E used for Robeo's abilities, use Right Shift and Right Control to use Juliet's.

This game was created over 3 days as part of the Game Developer's League Secret Jam
